mapper.insert: insert into t_uyijian (uyijianId, uyijianName, uyijianMark, uyijianMark1, uyijianMark2, uyijianImg, uyijianImgName, uyijianDate, uyijianDate1, uyijianType, uyijianType1, userId, userName, bumenId, bumenName ) values (#{uyijianId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{uyijianName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uyijianMark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uyijianMark1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uyijianMark2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uyijianImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uyijianImgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uyijianDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{uyijianDate1,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{uyijianType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{uyijianType1,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bumenId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{bumenName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update t_uyijian set uyijianName = #{uyijianName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, uyijianMark = #{uyijianMark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, uyijianMark1 = #{uyijianMark1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, uyijianMark2 = #{uyijianMark2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, uyijianImg = #{uyijianImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, uyijianImgName = #{uyijianImgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, uyijianDate = #{uyijianDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, uyijianDate1 = #{uyijianDate1,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, uyijianType = #{uyijianType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, uyijianType1 = #{uyijianType1,jdbcType=INTEGER}, userId = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, userName = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bumenId = #{bumenId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, bumenName = #{bumenName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where uyijianId = #{uyijianId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select uyijianId, uyijianName, uyijianMark, uyijianMark1, uyijianMark2, uyijianImg, uyijianImgName, uyijianDate, uyijianDate1, uyijianType, uyijianType1, userId, userName, bumenId, bumenName from t_uyijian where uyijianId = #{uyijianId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
